Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. of your first day at EPAM you will receive information to prepare you for your first days, and an outline of your agenda. your first day will include the following:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Meet the local People Lead who will guide you through an introduction to EPAM history, values, culture, company advantage and other useful information.  You will also learn about facts and policies specific to the Malta team. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your Resource Manager will take time to introduce your immediate team members, team structure, current projects and goals.  They will explain the first tasks for you to complete\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You will receive an overview of the EPAM internal systems and tools. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":5815,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8/duo.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8/duo.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"duo.PNG\",\"name\":\"duo.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":877,\"height\":60},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
